greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of closed Knight's tours on a 3 X n board.
comment: A070030 is the main entry for this sequence. See that entry for much more information.
reference: D. E. Knuth, Long and skinny knight's tours, in Selected Papers on Fun and Games, to appear, 2010.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2031 (terms 1..1000 from Alois P. Heinz)
George Jelliss, Open knight's tours of three-rank boards, Knight's Tour Notes, note 3a (21 October 2000).
George Jelliss, Closed knight's tours of three-rank boards, Knight's Tour Notes, note 3b (21 October 2000).
formula: Asymptotic value .0001899*3.11949^n when n is even.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 10 2010, based on a communication from _Don Knuth_, Apr 28 2010
